item.title: Field Maps
item.description: Introduction Let’s talk about a kind of common issue in programing. Imagine you have a large form to fill, or a SQL table to select column from, or really any type of data where you are interested by selecting subsets of its atomic components (like form results, or SQL columns). I call this data structures field maps data, and let’s see how we can implement the using the power of the Scala 3 language.
